instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00239 No Backlight - Output volt is 54.45v
threads.message:
Hi !

On this mackbook 820-00239 I have No Back-light Issue.
output volt is 54.45 .

While testing the back light circuit once i measured 45v on output, I check the screen It has image and was showing apple logo with back light on, I thought its working.
but when i pack it up it still has no back-light and showing 54.45v on output.


I have tried motherboard on another mackbook which has working screen, but still no luck.

Can anyone guide me to the right direction ?
thanks

threads.title: 820-00239 No Backlight - Output volt is 54.45v
threads.message:
54V means no connection with LEDs strip from LCD assembly.
If still same with known good assembly, then you must have bad LCD connector, or video cable.

threads.title: 820-00239 No Backlight - Output volt is 54.45v
threads.message: 54 volts means no load. Bad screen or cable
